Description:
Model
Brand: Corsair
Name: HARPOON RGB
Model: CH-9301011-NA


Details
Type: Wired
Interface: USB 2.0
Tracking Method: Optical
Maximum dpi: 6000 dpi
Hand Orientation: Right Hand
Buttons: 6
Scrolling Capability: 1 x Wheel
Color: Black


OS / System Requirement
Operating System Supported: Windows 10, Windows 8, or Windows 7
System Requirement: PC with USB 2.0 port 
An internet connection is required to download the Corsair Utlity Engine software


Features
Features: High-accuracy 6000 dpi optical gaming sensor: Advanced tracking and high-speed motion detection ideal for FPS gaming

Lightweight, and contoured design: Designed to fit naturally in your hand and support multiple grip styles. The upper surface features a fine coarse finish to provide a slip-free experience for ultimate control. The compact and lightweight body to help you with quick reactions and reduce fatigue over time

Textured molded rubber side grips: Molded rubber side grips enable you to hold the mouse with a confident, firm grip. Don't slip when lifting the mouse or make long or quick swipes

Six fully-programmable buttons: Take control with extensive customization, anything from simple remaps to complex macros

Onboard memory: Preconfigured for the best performance. No drivers, software or additional setup required. Customize your DPI stages and take them with you, knowing they are stored safely on your mouse

On-the-fly DPI switching: Instantly adapt your mouse sensitivity to the situation for total command in every environment


Package Contents
Package Contents: Corsair Gaming HARPOON RGB Gaming Mouse
Warranty Card, Quick Start Guide
Label: Mouse Corsair Harpoon RGB
